hymn.title: O God our Father, we would come to Thee
hymn.category: Worship of the Father—His Praise from Many Sons

layout.singingstanza: O God our Fa -- ther, we would come to Thee In vir -- tue of our Sav -- ior's pre -- cious blood; All dis -- tance gone, our souls by grace set free, We wor -- ship Thee, our Fa -- ther and our God.

lyrics.stanza: O God our Father, we would come to Thee In virtue of our Savior's precious blood; All distance gone, our souls by grace set free, We worship Thee, our Father and our God.
We would, O God, present before Thy face The fragrant name of Thy beloved Son; By faith we view Him through Thy boundless grace, Which, by His dying, He for us has won.
We bow in worship now before Thy throne, By faith the Object of Thy love would see; Who, in the midst, His brethren's song doth lead. To Him, our Savior, shall the glory be!
